name: Snake game made under an hour
name_original: Snake game made under an hour
description:
I wanted to remake an old game under an hour and decided to remake snake.

Time to plan included in the one hour !

Soon I am thinking about doing a version 2.0 with my own twist adding local multiplayer and deathmatch. This modification will be done in another one hour but planning will not be included since ideas flowed between the two sessions and the game got playtested.

I am doing this to learn how to work under pression, work faster, finish games and then playtest them to find what would make them unique and amazing.

Have a great time and thank you for letting your impression and a review  : )
